墾丁.definition: Kenting, a national park on the southern tip of Taiwan, popular as a tourist destination (abbr. for 墾丁國家公園|垦丁国家公园[Ken3 ding1 Guo2 jia1 Gong1 yuan2])

墾丁國家公園.pinyin: Ken3 ding1 Guo2 jia1 Gong1 yuan2
墾丁國家公園.definition: Kenting National Park on the Hengchun Peninsula 恆春半島|恒春半岛[Heng2 chun1 Ban4 dao3], Pingtung county, south Taiwan

墾利.definition: Kenli District in Dongying 東營|东营[Dong1 ying2], Shandong

墾利區.definition: Kenli District in Dongying 東營|东营[Dong1 ying2], Shandong

墾殖.definition: to open up land for cultivation

墾耕.definition: to bring under cultivation (scrubland, marshland etc)
